blur_detection.description: Receipt shows clear, well-defined text with minimal blur across all printed content.
blur_detection.recommendation: No action needed as text clarity is sufficient for OCR processing.

contrast_assessment.description: Black text on white thermal paper provides strong contrast for easy readability.
contrast_assessment.recommendation: Maintain current imaging conditions for future document captures.

glare_identification.description: Minor glare present in the upper portion from what appears to be a glass ashtray, but does not obscure any receipt text.
glare_identification.recommendation: Avoid placing reflective objects near receipts when photographing.

water_stains.description: No water stains or liquid damage visible on the receipt.
water_stains.recommendation: Continue keeping receipts dry and protected from liquids.

tears_or_folds.description: Receipt appears flat with no significant creases, tears, or folds affecting text readability.
tears_or_folds.recommendation: Maintain current handling practices to avoid physical damage.

cut_off_detection.description: The entire receipt is visible within the frame with no cut-off edges.
cut_off_detection.recommendation: Continue capturing full receipt within image frame.

missing_sections.description: Receipt appears complete with header, line items, totals, tax information, and footer text all visible.
missing_sections.recommendation: Maintain current capture methodology to include all receipt sections.

obstructions.description: Glass ashtray partially overlaps the top left corner but does not obscure any textual content.
obstructions.recommendation: Remove all objects from receipt before photographing to avoid potential obstructions.
